Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Eclectic Skill: Can attempt any skill requiring trained or expert proficiency
Esoteric Polymath: Can use Occultism to add spells to spellbook
Know-It-All: Successful Recall Knowledge checks give additional information
Melodious Spell: (1) A successful Performance vs. Perception hides subsequent spellcasting from observers
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5'/rd, or 10'/rd on a critical success
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
True Hypercognition: (1) Can Recall Knowledge up to 5 times in 1 action
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make an Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity (3 max); expert)
Armor: Padded Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Longspear (+28 1d8+4 P; strength; expert); Morningstar (+28 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert); Whip (+28 1d4+4 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Bard Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks; Longsword; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Whip)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Bard Weapon Expertise: Critical hits with a simple weapon, unarmed attack, longsword, rapier, sap, shortbow, shortsword, or whip inflict its critical specialization effect when a composition spell is active
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, and +4 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Greater Resolve: Save Legendary (Will)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Greater Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes, critical failures are normal failures, and suffers half damage on failed Will saves
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: O10: 2; O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; O6: 3; O7: 3; O8: 3; O9: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Occult: +32 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Occult: 42 (charisma; legendary)
Spells:
Allegro (OC7 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Target may take an additional Strike, Stride, or Step for 1 rd
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Dirge Of Doom (OC3 Foc Enc): (1) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes for 1 rd
Fatal Aria (O10 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Kills a target up to level 16 or 50 HP, inflicts 0 HP and dying 1 on a level 17 target, or inflicts 50 HP on a level 18+ target
House Of Imaginary Walls (OC5 Foc Ill): (1) Creates an invisible, illusionary, 10'x10' wall with Armor Class 10, double the spell level Hardness, and quadruple the spell level HP, for 1 rd
Inspire Competence (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Defense (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, plus resistance of half the spell level to physical damage, for 1 rd
Inspire Heroics (O4 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the effects of a subsequent Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense to +2, or +3 on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Loremaster's Etude (O1 Foc Div): (F) R30' Target may take the better of two rolls on the triggering Recall Knowledge check
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Soothing Ballad (O7 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Self and 9 allies gain a counteract attempt on all fear effects, a counteract attempt on all paralysis effects, or 7d8 HP restored (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP)
Triple Time (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +10' Speed for 1 rd
True Strike (O1 Div): (1) Self uses the better of two attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Magic Notes:
Allegro: Knows the Allegro occult cantrip
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Dirge Of Doom: Knows the Dirge Of Doom occult cantrip
Enigma: Knows the True Strike occult spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Fatal Aria: Knows the Fatal Aria occult spell/+1 Focus Points
House Of Imaginary Walls: Knows the House Of Imaginary Walls occult cantrip
Inspire Competence: Knows the Inspire Competence occult cantrip
Inspire Defense: Knows the Inspire Defense occult cantrip
Inspire Heroics: Knows the Inspire Heroics occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Occult)
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Loremaster's Etude: Knows the Loremaster's Etude occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult)
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Perfect Encore: +1 10th level spell slot
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Soothing Ballad: Knows the Soothing Ballad occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Triple Time: Knows the Triple Time occult cantrip
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Deep Lore: Knows 1 additional spell of each level
Eclectic Polymath: Can retain a chosen Esoteric Polymath spell in repertoire by removing a spell of the same level
Effortless Concentration: (F) Extends the duration of 1 spell
Esoteric Polymath: Can prepare 1 spell from spellbook each day, treating it as an additional signature spell if it is in repertoire
Eternal Composition: Can use an additional action each rd to cast a composition cantrip
Harmonize: (1) Can have 2 composition spells active simultaneously
Impossible Polymath: Can add arcane, divine, and primal spells to spellbook if trained in the corresponding skill
Inspirational Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Magnum Opus: Knows 2 10th-level occult spells
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Studious Capacity: Can cast 1 additional spell of level 9 or lower each day
Symphony Of The Muse: Can have any number of composition spells active simultaneously
Unusual Composition: (1) Replaces the somatic components of a composition spell with verbal components or vice versa
Versatile Signature: Can replace 1 signature spell each day
